name: Guiding Lights (Ronnie Sallan)
description:
Guide the lights to the diamonds using the laws of refraction and reflection.

How to play Credits

Game by Ronnie Sallan

GarageBand was used for the sound effects and music.

IBM Plex typeface family was used for the text.

Misc.

The game performs accurate physics calculations, using Snell's law to compute the angles of refraction.
